issue.title: [Python] Expose UnionArray to pyarrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1687](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1687). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should expose UnionArray to Python via pyarrow.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1687?focusedCommentId=16210354) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I swore there was a JIRA already for this but I couldn't find it. This is one of the last things missing (from what's already been implemented) from pyarrow. We also will need to deal with conversions to NumPy arrays which may be a fair bit of work

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1687?focusedCommentId=16210439) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Duplicate of ARROW-972
